page.title: 08Employment
page.content: The sawmill lies to the south of the B935 and to the west of Forteviot village. W. and P. Murray , Coatbridge, own the mill. The present manager has been employed here for 38 years. The new extension was erected about 10 years ago.The older building has been standing for about 100 years. The manager lives on the premises.There are 25 employees altogether. The sawmill operates 7.30p.m.-4p.m. and is always busy. 90% of the work is for B.R., N.C.B and box makers.10% of the work centres around the manufacture of fence posts.The trees come from all over Scotland.Continentals come here to see one of the most modern sawmills in Scotland.
